Name: Requiring the department of correction to utilize zero emission vehicles.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to utilize zero emission vehicles

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Criminal Justice

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - March 24, 2022

Summary: This bill would prohibit the Department of Correction from utilizing vehicles that are not zero emission.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Chapter 1 of title 9 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 9-163 to read as follows:
      � 9-163 Zero emission vehicles. The department shall not utilize a vehicle that is not zero emission. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect on August 31, 2027.
